text: Hey there everyone; back in 2012 you may

roll Yahtzee...
- 'I have done it,
this tape's about to end, but I've done it'

- Now even now, a few years later,
I'm still receiving one roll yahtzees
from you and I love getting them. I
thought I'd show you a few more today,
but to mark the occasion I thought I'd
also do something a little bit special
myself. Here I am attempting a one roll
Yahtzee, but this time not with five but
six dice - and six pink dice because- well,
that's a bit of a Numberphile trademark
isn't it? And I'm not just recording it,
I'm attempting to capture it with a

Why don't you calculate the odds on that
one. Or how about the likelihood of five
